DOC.brief_summary: Employers increasingly look opportunity motivate sedentary employee become physically active . Workplace walk program mixed success typically show improvement among participant already fairly active baseline . The goal study determine whether financial incentive program motivate sedentary employee increase number step walk per day meet minimum threshold . The primary outcome measure proportion day minimum activity 7000 step achieve . Outcomes assess week 3 month use incentive follow 3 month follow-up without incentive . Secondary outcome include average step walk per day .
